story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful land full of enchanting gardens and sparkling stars, there lived a young girl named Amina. Amina was a kind and loving girl who always tried to help others and make the world a better place.

One night, as Amina was getting ready for bed, her father sat down beside her and said, "My dear daughter, do you know the story of the magic lamp?" Amina's eyes widened with excitement as she shook her head no.

Her father began to tell her the tale of a magical lamp that granted wishes to those who rubbed it with a pure heart. The lamp was hidden deep in a cave, guarded by a powerful jinn who tested the courage and kindness of anyone who sought it.

Amina imagined herself on a grand adventure, searching for the lamp to help those in need. She pledged to always be kind and compassionate, knowing that such qualities would lead her to the lamp and allow her wishes to come true.

With a heart full of hope and love, Amina drifted off to sleep, dreaming of the magic lamp and all the wonderful things she could do with its power. And as the night grew quiet, her father whispered a prayer for his precious daughter, wishing her endless happiness and blessings for all her days to come.

And so, Amina slept peacefully, guided by the light of love and faith, knowing that her dreams were safe in the hands of her caring father and the watchful gaze of the stars above.

Goodnight, sweet Amina. May your dreams be filled with joy and wonder, and may you always remember the power of kindness and love.
